creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of John M. and Janet B. McKelvey
description: Short and wide bowl; repeated stairstep pattern with fine line detail painted with brown pigment around rim; mutiple brown tadpoles and dragonflies, and brown spotted orange frogs paint on top half of bowl; base of bowl is signed with artist name, community, and copyright dates;
markings: Signed on bottom Noreen Simplicio Zuni 10/89
title: Seed Bowl
